title: HoP 268 - To Hell and Back - Dante Alighieri
itunes:title: HoP 268 - To Hell and Back - Dante Alighieri
description: Italy’s greatest poet Dante Alighieri was also a philosopher, as we learn from his Convivio and of course the Divine Comedy.
